title: LF silver players
body:
Hi guys, I am just looking for our silver mates who wana play rank together, its my 1st time asking in boards to play in dynamic que, as I am really frustrated bcoz of some players who are bad, in saying so I am here to learn and not criticizing any one out there its just I am sad, and just want some decent players, doesn't matter we lose game or lose line, but if we know the basics and can farm and just not die a lot then its fine idm losing in such game

also very important please don't be toxic as it really hurt some people >.>

replies.body: Chuck me a friend request dude, happy to duo with you im silver 5 atm looking to climb as well.

Add me im Cyrexg, looking for silver ranked team mates also
mainly play support

VeganCrossfitter is my ign, hit me up man/woman/attack-helicopter and I may join you if I'm not with my mates messing around in norms, I main jg but am also a pretty huge thresh main in the bot (he is bae ever since they ruined my top lane shen), or ekko mid. i generally pick jg because its easier to carry with but idm either which way
btw sorry for grammatical errors I've been busting out uni assignments all arvo
I would like a few games see how it is if you don't mind http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=smokedaawg this is my op.gg

> [{quoted}](name=SmokeDaawG,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=LKg3JdEp,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-08-27T23:17:28.220+0000)
>
> I would like a few games see how it is if you don't mind http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=smokedaawg this is my op.gg

I don't mind about past game, things happen for reason, bad players or its just bad luck or u play greedy sometimes, I am in game after game I will add you :)
i main {{champion:222}} and i play a bit of {{champion:421}} in the jungle add me sometime ill be on from tomorrow afternoon :D
^_^ I will see you tomorrow then will add you in a mean time

{{champion:34}} Main here with a 62% win rate on her and 240 games this season
My op.gg: http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Frostbite%20Falcon

i do have other champions i play like {{champion:15}} and {{champion:8}} both with a positive win rate but i do not play them as well as anivia

added you :)

idm what players you play, and yeah bird is op -.- and I hate fish and bird tbh but glad to see u play 1 of them XD
